text: In the Mapping section of the ECS Inspector -Search Fields page, click the New Mapping button. Next, click the Browse button to open the UDR Internal Format Browser dialog. Open Select the UDR type you want and click OK . You will return to the New Mapping dialog. Open In the Field Mappings section of the dialog, click Browse to select a UDR Field by browsing the UDR Fields list. Open Select the UDR Field row to associate with the chosen label and click OK . Note! Click Clear if you want to clear the association you have created between the label and the UDR Field. Repeat the previous step for all the UDR Types where you want to map the UDR Field to a defined field label. Click the Apply button when you are done. The configuration is saved, and the next time the ECS receives UDRs from an ECS forwarding agent, the configured UDR fields are added as metadata. These fields can later be used for searches, see Searching with the ECS Inspector . Open
title: Mapping UDR Fields to Labels - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
